page.description: DAY() returns an integer corresponding to the day of the month for the Date or Date_Time value.

prototypes.prototype: Day_Of_Month as N = DAY( Date as D )
Day_Of_Month as N = DAY( Date_Time as T )

argument.name: date
argument.description: A variable containing a date value or a character string containing a legitimate representation of a date value ( ISDATE(Date) = .T.).

argument.name: Date_Time
argument.description: A variable containing a date-time value (type T).
